document_data.name: Niwa Onshi
document_data.mainbody: '''Niwa Onshi''' was a [[samurai]] member of the [[Niwa clan]] and shugodai of [[Kuda]] in [[Kozakura]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Onshi lived in [[Kuda]] where he had his office. He led three hundred samurai and one thousand [[bushi]]. Often, however, Onshi was busy at [[Tamanokuni]] or at the [[bakufu]] capital.
document_data.Relationship: Onshi was a cousin of [[Niwa Hirotada]]. He was also head of the [[Niwa no Kuda]] branch of Niwa.
